page.title: 02HOMELIFE IN THORNTON
page.content:
MY MOTHER,{MRS LINDA TAYLOR} ,LIVES IN A SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE.THERE ARE THREE MEMBERS IN OUR FAMILY. MY MOTHER WORKS AS A CIVIL SERVANT FOR THE D.H.S.S.SHE WORKS MAINLY TO HELP SUPPORT OUR FAMILY. SHE DOESN'T LIKE HOUSEWORK SO SHE GETS A CLEANING LADY TO HELP HER.OCCASIONALLY I HELP TO DO THE CLEANING.WE BOTH DO LOTS OF COOKING AND WE GET MOST OF OUR FOOD FROM SAFEWAYS.WE LIKE FRESH FOOD ALTHOUGH IT IS HARD TO MAKE AND PREPARE.BEFORE WE MOVED TO THORNTON-CLEVELEYS WE LIVED IN BLACKPOOL.PETER,MY STEP-FATHER,ALSO HELPS TO SUPPORT THE FAMILY.HE WORKS AS A TILES REPRESENTATIVE.
{ BY CLAIRE TAYLOR }
